name: api-generation
description: Provides project for generating api from OpenAPI spec and converting from typescript to vanilla javascript.

scripts.replace1: sed -i 's/import { fetchBaseQuery } from .*;/import extendedBaseQuery from "..\/dynamic-base-query";/g' api.generated.ts
scripts.start: npm run generate && npm run replace1 && npm run replace2 && npm run compile

author: ITKDev
